channel.title: ml-agents on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist
channel.description: Recent content in ml-agents on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist

item.title: hello machines
item.description: i guess the machine learning seminar i took got me thinking started playing with the ML-Agents package in Unity. idk if I am hoping I can somehow program robots to finish the game for me, or if I am just bored and needed some new influx of input it is definitely intriguing and I’m surprised how quickly the agents could outperform me.
